sentences.english: AMERICA'S political priorities have undergone a breathtaking about-turn.
sentences.chinese: 美国政治上优先考虑的事情已然经历了一个大转变。

sentences.english: Therefore, statuary had turn into a three-dimensional political picture poster.
sentences.chinese: 由此，雕塑成为了一种立体的政治“宣传画”。

sentences.english: One cannot overlook his uncanny ability to navigate the many political intrigues and maneuverings.
sentences.chinese: 没人能忽略他平息各种政治阴谋诡计的禀赋。

sentences.english: Just where do the politics of IT workers lie?
sentences.chinese: 政治职业IT工作者的谎言来自何处？

sentences.english: This is a new era in Gulf politics and security.
sentences.chinese: 这是海湾地区政治和安全的新时期。

sentences.english: Hope that the United States will abandon the Cold War mentality, not in Hongkong to engage in political gamesmanship.
sentences.chinese: 希望美方摒弃冷战思维，不在香港搞政治上的小动作。

sentences.english: Hanfeizi has reflected Hanfei's political viewpoint in a concentrated way.
sentences.chinese: 《韩非子》集中反映了韩非的政治观点。

sentences.english: Power-centralized political system is political origin of the debt.

sentences.english: Politically there were the tax reform and adjustment of the lower administration systems.
sentences.chinese: 政治方面体现在赋役的改革和基层管理体系的调整。

sentences.english: This is a unique opportunity to get a progressive politician to be the president of the council.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个令进步政治家成为理事会主席得大好机会。

sentences.english: Inculcation is the basic way of Marxist theory education.
sentences.chinese: 灌输是马克思主义政治教育的基本原则。

sentences.english: Opposition politicians blame the government, saying a river project has reduced farmland.
sentences.chinese: 反对党的政治人物指责政府河川的计划使得农地减少。

sentences.english: This is why the modern Chinese politics becomes imitative politics.
sentences.chinese: 这使得中国现代政治成了“模仿的政治”。

sentences.english: In the world of today, absolute majority countries have parties and exercise party politics.
sentences.chinese: 当今世界，绝大多数国家都存在政党，实行政党政治。
